effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
The user gathers all its light energy and
releases it at once. It may also lower the
target’s Sp. Def stat.
